text: Heliconia sclerotricha is a species of plant in the family Heliconiaceae.José E. Abalo & Gustavo Morales L. 1983. Phytologia 52(6): 406-407, f. sn., Heliconia sclerotricha It is endemic to Ecuador.World Checklist of Selected Plant Families, Heliconia sclerotrichaUlloa Ulloa, C. & Pitman, N. 2004. Heliconia sclerotricha. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
